Feedback: The mobile app crashes when exporting large datasets to CSV. This is blocking our quarterly reporting workflow.
We urgently need SSO/SAML integration for enterprise deployment. Our security team won't approve without it.
Dark mode would be a great addition for users who work late nights. Many of our team members have requested this.
The search functionality is too slow when filtering by multiple criteria. It takes 10+ seconds to load results.
Export to PDF feature has formatting issues - tables are cut off and images don't render properly.
Mobile notifications are not working on Android devices. iOS works fine but Android users get no alerts.
Would love to see integrations with Slack and Microsoft Teams for real-time updates and collaboration.
The bulk import feature times out with files larger than 100MB. We need to process 500MB+ files.
Custom fields and metadata support would help us track project-specific information more effectively.
API rate limits are too restrictive for our use case. We need higher limits or throttling options.
